programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S2
programme.desc: Monica Galetti and Giles Coren hop across to Ireland to scale the imposing and ancient ramparts of Ashford Castle. Set in 350 acres, it was founded 800 years ago by the Anglo-Norman De Burgo family, and much later became the family home of the Guinness family. With the help of hotel historian Fintan, Giles discovers that the castle has had a rollercoaster journey through the centuries, sporadically reaching moments of real jeopardy, only to be saved by a turn of events or new owners.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan S2
programme.desc: Diana enlists the help of chef Jerry Mai to explore the vibrant flavours that are integral to Cambodian cooking. Together they prepare a popular breakfast dish Nam Banh Chok- Fish Curry Vermicelli Noodle Soup.Diana celebrates Cambodian cuisine with Kampot Pepper Vongole and Nhom Krauch Thlong- Pomelo Salad with Prawns.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Alltime Greatest Clip Show
programme.desc: "AllTime Greatest Clip Show" features the very best online content from creators around the world. Grouped around easy to follow themes and segments, the series covers a wide variety of clips from DIY stunts with epic fails, to polished professionals and their mind blowing achievements.

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos S3
programme.desc: Showcasing funny (or odd) videos, often featuring kids, adults or pets doing weird things.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: Just before a match, Ken is rattled by Xander and his powerful new technique, but after a pep talk from the team, he vows to put his fears behind him. Next it's Valt's turn to face Xander in a three-point match. Something seems to be wrong with Valtryek, despite Valt's determination to win.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Nefertine On The Nile
programme.desc: Nefertine is an eight-year-old girl who lives in ancient Egypt and is gifted with inexhaustible curiosity and courage. She occasionally gets herself into sticky situations, but luckily her trusted friend Piramses is always there to give her a hand. The two friends, accompanied by the cat Micerina, go on incredible adventures, from investigating mysterious mummies to discovering the secrets of the sphinx!

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S1
programme.desc: The sky looks darker than usual today, and the little trains are worried. Fix and Lift warn the little trains that there may be a storm coming, but Diesel ignores their warning and goes out. After Diesel leaves, the weather gets worse. Thunder roars and lightning flashes. Titipo and Genie become worried about Diesel and go out to find him.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Yellow Square feels down when he notices that everyone has a job in Ollipolis, but he doesn't. Ollie, Sloppy and Cherry attempt to find a job for him. The gang lend the squares their go kart to do their paper route but things go wrong when the squares don't take care of the go kart.

programme.desc: A mysterious dolphin in a sophisticated electronic harness zaps all the power from the Rover! Ant and Fontaine manage to remove the harness, but can they rehabilitate this cybernetic dolphin to survive in the wild?

programme.title: Sketch 2
programme.desc: In the last season of Sketch, The Bad Fairy, Van, had been defeated. Erwin was named the Keeper' of the Magic Sketch Book but realized to his horror that he has lost his talent for drawing. Erwin has lost his ability to draw, and is dealing with both the loss of his passion for art as well as the repercussions on his Keepership of the book. He realizes that he can no longer perform his duties as the Keeper, and decides to pass the responsibility on to someone else.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - My Unique Farm
programme.desc: (Encore) Four Singaporeans left their corporate jobs to be farmers overseas. We find out how these urbanites learn to grow uncommon foods in four different countries.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) Sales of bottled water are rising in Singapore, despite the country being renowned for its safe to drink tap water. Steven Chia uncaps a variety of bottled waters to see if they are worth our money.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Tanya cannot hold back how she truly feels about Wai Meng and lashes at him. Single and ready to mingle Felicia continues to use the dating app to improve her love life. After the panic attack scare, Wafiq tries to spend more time with Kalila while trying to keep the gym up and running.

programme.title: Deals For Joy

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Luke leaves the hustle and bustle of Hanoi behind for the mystical mountains of Sapa. There, he prepares some black chicken in and amongst the local streets. He cooks buffalo for a salad in the busy Sapa markets, as well as a tofu-and-tomato dish high up in the rice paddy fields with the most spectacular backdrop.

programme.title: Field Trip With Curtis Stone S1
programme.desc: Among medieval towns, dense forests, and winding cobblestone streets, a trip to Umbria finds Curtis chasing canine companions for black truffles and getting a tutorial from a master of porchetta. He later perfects the artistry of pigeon butchery to prepare a dish that utilizes all parts of the bird.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

In the meantime, she forms a closer relationship with one of her fellow trainee, Eureka, as well as with Ares.

It is a destination in itself - a destination of endless fun, songs, dances, discovery and wonders! At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.title: Bugsville
programme.desc: Bugsville is an entertaining and educational pre-school programme featuring NATALIE, her parents (Mary and Fred) and her friends. The show will feature live action filmed in home sets as well as composited CGI shot in a green screen studio.

programme.title: Kit n Kate S1
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fixies S3
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Ricky Zoom S1
programme.desc: Little red rescue motorbike Ricky Zoom, along with his loyal and enthusiastic bike buddies Loop, Scootio and DJ, race around the sports track, try new stunts at the park, and zoom into adventures.

programme.title: Ricky Zoom S1
programme.desc: Little red rescue motorbike Ricky Zoom, along with his loyal and enthusiastic bike buddies Loop, Scootio and DJ, race around the sports track, try new stunts at the park, and zoom into adventures.

programme.title: Tell Us Eddy!
programme.desc: Why do flowers bloom? Why does it rain? Let's answer children's various questions about natural phenomena in a fun and easy way!

programme.title: Little Tami's Book S1
programme.desc: Tami and Hebe start complaining after they missed their bus. To prove that they can be better Bus Drivers, they dive into Booky to try out the Bus Driver Badge. Will the trio really be better bus drivers like they had imagined?

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: The Enchanted Village Of Pinocchio
programme.desc: THE ENCHANTED VILLAGE OF PINOCCHIO is a fun and positive adaptation of Carlo Collodi's masterpiece. It's a series for the entire family, both moving and funny, where the world of childhood meets the world of fairy tales.

programme.title: Dogmatix And The Indomitables
programme.desc: Dogmatix leads a gang of animal friends, the Indomitables, living in Lutetia (Paris in the Ancient World), who have to battle it out with the Romans (who insist on imposing their way of life on the Gaulish people). With its fast-paced high jinks, high-speed chases and a touch of magic, Dogmatix and the Indomitables will provide great fun and adventures for all!

programme.title: The Smurfs S2
programme.desc: Blue and small, standing only three apples high, the Smurfs might be hard to tell apart at first. However, each Smurf is a distinct individual with his or her own personality, their names say it all!

programme.title: Don't Try This At Home
programme.desc: While kids play and learn, they're sometimes being told to do things that they just do not like. In this series, they will see why they should or should not do things they're told, as demonstrated by hosts Nikki Muller and Aiken Chia.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks S4
programme.desc: The Chipmunks along with Kevin and Cheesy decide to crash BoCarter's birthday yacht party after not being invited.

programme.title: Oddbods S2
programme.desc: The unique and quirky gang of Fuse, Newt, Pogo, Bubbles, Jeff, Zee and Slick laugh, trick and trip their way through life.

programme.title: Giganto Club SG
programme.desc: Howie craves his favourite green lemon drink to beat the Cretacia heat but his pals at the Giganto Club have no idea where to find the fruit! It is up to Giganto, and a bit of Zumba, to save the day.

programme.title: iYO
programme.desc: Tom has a loose tooth that's making it difficult for him to eat his favourite foods. It's up to iYO to come up with ideas to feed Tom while not disturbing the tooth.

programme.title: Rise Of The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S1
programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers go on adventures where they end up tapping into mystic ninja powers.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: When a seam comes undone on Bearbarian's back, it iches terribly. With nothing and no one to help, the teddy bear decides to wake Zoe's three plush cats... the Scratch Pack is back!

programme.title: Magic Adventures: The Crystal Of Dark
programme.desc: A young princess Olivia is transported to many wondrous lands and along the way she teams up with allies. Together they embark on a dangerous quest to find 4 great wizards and 7 magic crystals that will help her stop the Dark wizard and save her parents, and they learn that real magic is having good virtues of courage, friendship, and cooperation.

programme.title: Moominvalley S1 & S2
programme.desc: Moomintroll employs the services of his new friend, a little ghost, to convince Snorkmaiden that he is brave. But when his trick backfires dangerously, Moomintroll is the one who needs saving.

programme.title: The Tales Of Alex & Weero
programme.desc: Join Alex and the cute animated creature Weero in their time travelling escapades through history.

programme.title: Asia Unplated with Diana Chan S2
programme.desc: Jacob Leung shares his tips to a perfect fried rice at home with his 'Mum's Malaysian Fried Rice.' Diana is joined by her cousin, Karen Chan, who whips up her authentic 'Nonya Laksa Lemak'. Diana prepares her sweet and spicy 'Mee Goreng Mamak'.

programme.title: Planet Action S2
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Alltime Greatest Clip Show
programme.desc: AllTime Greatest Clip Show features the very best online content from creators around the world. Grouped around easy to follow themes and segments, the series covers a wide variety of clips from DIY stunts with epic fails, to polished professionals and their mind blowing achievements.

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos S3
programme.desc: Showcasing funny (or odd) videos, often featuring kids, adults or pets doing weird things.

programme.title: Snake Eyes: G.I. Joe Origins
programme.desc: A G.I. Joe spin-off centered around the character of Snake Eyes.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore Season 4
programme.desc: Singapore's Top 12 Home Cooks arrive in the MasterChef Kitchen for the very first time and are greeted by a special guest who has done it all before -Singapore's very own Sashi Cheliah. The bottom six face then face the very first mystery box- only this is no ordinary mystery box. They must cook with every part of each ingredient they use as well as use the box' itself.

programme.title: Chris Packham's Animal Einsteins
programme.desc: Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brain power. Looking at a variety of animals, such as ravens, crows, bees and starlings, Chris explores how different animals can use tools, solve complex puzzles, recognise themselves in mirrors and even reason like humans.

programme.title: 棘手问题
programme.desc: (重) 一些科学家指出，如果我们继续以这样的速度产生温室气体，我们将可以看到更多的害虫。地球暖化不仅会导致害虫数量增加，也会让它们的食欲大增。事实上，如淡滨尼和樟宜那么大的一群蝗虫，就可以在一天内，摧毁足够养活新加坡10倍人口的粮食。就目前来说，全球有10%到15%的农作物遭害虫所破坏，而气温每上升一个摄氏度，全球的粮食产量就会下降10%到25%。尽管我们的粮食供应受到地球暖化的威胁，我们目前的饮食习惯却也是导致地球暖化的原因之一。从饲养牲畜、种植蔬菜，到加工及运输……只要你进食，你就属于占全球温室气体排.
